title: Perma banned
body: So I haven't logged into league in almost a year. I tried logging in today and found out I was perma banned for third party software usage. I have no idea what software can be used while playing or anything of the sort. For the simple fact though I received no notification of my account being perma banned. A while back I was hacked with several of my social media accounts, but I did not think my league account was a part of that. I for sure know my account was hacked because after logging in on the website and looking at previous match history the characters used are characters I have never used before in my years of playing league and the people in the match were the same people that I do not know at all and for the matches to have been played all on 5-29-19 all day long I definitely was hacked because that was a wednesday and I was at work all day. I would like my account back because I was perma banned and it wasnt even me playing my account was definitely hacked and I received no notification of this perma banned even happening. This is unfair and I have a lot of skins that i spent money on from years ago. I just want my account back and to be able to play again I have already changed my password and just want my account back.

replies.body: Your account was stolen and used by a scripter or botter. Send a support ticket asking for your account to be investigated. If it is determined to have been stolen, it will be frozen and you may be able to reactivate it by providing proof it is yours.
I hope they give me the chance to prove that it was stolen because it most definitely was hacked and stolen

Send a ticket to riot support
We on the boards can't do anything about it
I just sent a ticket a little while ago I just don't want to lose my account
